mapper.insert: INSERT INTO p_todo SET iplant = #{iplant}, ctnt = #{ctnt}, deadline = #{deadline}, repeat_yn = #{repeatYn}
INSERT INTO p_day SET itodo = #{itodo}, repeat_day = #{repeatDay}
mapper.select: SELECT A.ctnt, DATE_FORMAT(A.deadline, "%m-%d") month,date_format(A.deadline, "%H-%i") time, B.nick_nm nickNm, B.nm, A.finish_yn finishYn FROM p_todo A INNER JOIN p_plant B ON A.iplant = B.iplant WHERE del_yn = 0 ORDER BY deadline

SELECT A.ctnt, DATE_FORMAT(A.deadline, "%m-%d") MONTH, date_format(A.deadline, "%H-%i") time, B.nick_nm nickNm, B.nm, A.finish_yn finishYn FROM p_todo A INNER JOIN p_plant B ON A.iplant = B.iplant WHERE DATE(deadline) = #{deadline} AND del_yn = 0 ORDER BY time
mapper.update: UPDATE p_todo SET iplant = #{iplant}, deadline = #{deadline}, ctnt = #{ctnt}, repeat_yn = #{repeatYn}, updated_at = current_timestamp WHERE itodo = #{itodo}
mapper.select: SELECT B.ctnt, A.repeat_day repeatDay, DATE_FORMAT(B.deadline, "%m-%d") todoMonth, DATE_FORMAT(B.deadline, "%H:%i") todoTime, C.nick_nm nickNm, C.nm FROM p_day A INNER JOIN p_todo B ON A.itodo = B.itodo INNER JOIN p_plant C ON C.iplant = B.iplant
